title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Someone in your circle provides you with the proper motivation regarding your career goals. But not all advice is delivered pleasantly or even with the best of intentions today. A person who doesnt know you well might dare you to tackle a challenge more from doubt than belief in you and your abilities. However, theres no point in buying into their disbelief. Dont follow through on doing something ill-conceived to prove an adversary wrong. Instead, be confident about every step you take as you blaze your own trail. Transform negativity into positivity with the power of your mind. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
